mapper.insert: insert into signinfo ( trafficIcon, `Name`, Longitude, Latitude, roadSection, detailedAdd, Jurisdictio, createTime,Remark) values ( #{trafficicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roadsection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailedadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jurisdictio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate(), #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ObjectID,

mapper.select: -- select ObjectID,Name,Longitude,Latitude,detailedAdd,Remark,u.trafficIcon2,u.maintenance,u.maintenance1,u.maintenance2,u.maintenance3 FROM signinfo s -- LEFT JOIN urliconinfo u ON s.trafficIcon=u.trafficIcon -- LEFT JOIN -- (select t.sign_OID,t.maintenance,t.maintenance1,t.maintenance2,t.maintenance3 from( select row_number() over (partition by sign_OID order by maintenance desc) as rn,u.* from signmaintenanceinfo u) t where t.rn=1) u -- ON u.sign_OID=s.ObjectID SELECT * FROM signinfo
